name: Lost in the Mythic Island
description:
NOTICE: DOWNLOADS ARE TEMPORARILY DISABLED AS THE SERVERS ARE DOWN FOR A UNKNOWN AMOUNT OF TIME

Long ago the world was at war with itself. The Races was on the brink of destruction. However we were saved by a rift, a tear, in space time that had appeared seemingly out of nowhere. The Rift whisked a good amount of The races away and took us to this new and strange world. It was unlike anything I had ever seen before. We were taken into a new world that we had never seen before. And it will take a while for us to understand what is going on. Why are here, or how we return home. But life will be a full of many things till we find those answers.

Lost in the Mythic Island is a multiplayer first person shooter, The game is currently in Pre-Alpha stage.

Click on the above image for Instructions on improving performance on devices

On a low end device and want to improve performance on the game, Click on the above image and look at our tips on how to improve performance.

Website: http://lostinthemythicisland.com/
